welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bellview, a charming city known for its scenic views and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy our beautiful city and all it has to offer. We hope you have a memorable stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Pensacola NAS Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pensacola International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A serves primarily domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves primarily domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edwards Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Edwards Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
